items.sentence: It took Tom a long time to get over Mary\'s death.
I think there\'s something you\'re not telling me.
I shouldn\'t have to tell you to do your homework.
Tom thinks that the sun revolves around the earth.
Tom thought the watch Mary had given him was ugly.
Tom told Mary that it was too hot to play outside.
Tom told Mary that it would probably snow all day.
Tom told Mary that she looked like Marilyn Monroe.
It seems that Tom only eats fruits and vegetables.
Tom spilled red wine all over Mary\'s white dress.
Tom told Mary that he\'d help her wash the dishes.
I have a lot of friends who can speak French well.
I have the feeling you had something else in mind.
I have two dogs. One is white and the other black.
I hear he was released after five years in prison.
What\'s your favorite place to go hear live music?
What\'s your favorite thing to do on a first date?
What\'s your favorite type of restaurant to go to?
What\'s your favorite way to spend time in Boston?
What\'s your favorite way to spend your free time?
Didn\'t you know Tom isn\'t really from Australia?
Tom took a picture of his dog and sent it to Mary.
Tom took his coat out of the closet and put it on.
Tom took off his clothes and got into the bathtub.
Tom translated the letter from French into German.
Will you take care of the children while I\'m out?
You don\'t need to be religious to believe in God.
You don\'t really think Tom would do that, do you?
You don\'t really want to talk about this, do you?
You don\'t think Tom really could do that, do you?
No matter what happens, I\'m not changing my mind.
Old people aren\'t always wiser than young people.
Tom told Mary that the cake she baked tasted good.
Tom told his son not to speak with his mouth full.
Tom took the orange juice out of the refrigerator.
If there had been a problem, Tom would\'ve called.
Tom and Mary went for a walk in the park together.
Tom and Mary went on a picnic with John and Alice.
Tom and Mary went to the worst restaurant in town.
Tom and Mary were both wearing heavy winter coats.
Tom and Mary were just in time for the last train.
Tom and Mary were surprised to see John and Alice.
It won\'t be the first time that Tom\'s been late.
I don\'t want Tom making the same mistakes I made.
I don\'t want Tom to make the same mistake I made.
I don\'t want to be the person who tells Tom that.
I don\'t want to do that without the proper tools.
I don\'t want to sleep on the couch again tonight.
I don\'t want you to make the same mistake I made.
I can\'t believe it. Tom can\'t believe it either.
